thread.title: 'It's the best thing you can do' - husband of tragic coastguard Caitriona Lucas has urged people to volunteer with the service

title: 'It's the best thing you can do' - husband of tragic coastguard Caitriona Lucas has urged people to volunteer with the service
text: 0 Comments Share 'It's the best thing you can do' - husband of tragic coastguard Caitriona Lucas has urged people to volunteer with the service Independent.ie Brave coastguard Caitriona Lucas has been remembered as a "marvelous, bubbly person" as her husband has urged people to get involved in the voluntary service. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/its-the-best-thing-you-can-do-husband-of-tragic-coastguard-caitriona-lucas-has-urged-people-to-volunteer-with-the-service-35366795.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35281522.ece/54aa4/AUTOCROP/h342/Caitriona%20Lucas.jpg 'It is like there is half of you missing, you can't stand up straight' - Husband of hero coastguard Caitríona Lucas Caitriona Lucas and Inset her husband Bernard Caitriona Lucas (41) who died tragically in a rescue mission in Kilkee Brave coastguard Caitriona Lucas has been remembered as a "marvelous, bubbly person" as her husband has urged people to get involved in the voluntary service. Share 'It's the best thing you can do' - husband of tragic coastguard Caitriona Lucas has urged people to volunteer with the service Independent.ie Brave coastguard Caitriona Lucas has been remembered as a "marvelous, bubbly person" as her husband has urged people to get involved in the voluntary service. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/its-the-best-thing-you-can-do-husband-of-tragic-coastguard-caitriona-lucas-has-urged-people-to-volunteer-with-the-service-35366795.html
